list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update README and refine SQL scripts
The README file has been updated with instructions for setting up the testing environment. Also, necessary changes were made to the SQL scripts and corresponding Dockerfile changes were applied. This included renaming insertv2.sql to insertFinal.sql and final.sql to createFinal.sql, and improving code readability and management of data insertion.

task.summary:
Remove unnecessary SQL scripts
The commit involves the deletion of various SQL scripts that were redundant or obsolete. This clean-up action simplifies the database management and enhances readability of the code base by removing unnecessary SQL scripts used for creating, inserting, selecting and other actions on the database.

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
Remove unnecessary SQL scripts
The commit involves the deletion of various SQL scripts that were redundant or obsolete. This clean-up action simplifies the database management and enhances readability of the code base by removing unnecessary SQL scripts used for creating, inserting, selecting and other actions on the database.

task.summary:
Improve test code formatting and nest SQL operations
Test cases in RestaurantTableTest and ReservesRepositoryImplTest are uniformly formatted with the updated indentation. SQL operations in ReservesRepositoryImplTest are now nested inside try-catch blocks, enhancing readability and error handling.

Expand reservation application functionalities
Extended the reservation application to include management of staff assignments, staff, and tables. Additionally, added back navigation from management menus to the main menu, providing a more user-friendly interface. Improved the insert functionality to fully automate ID assignment in the database.

Expand reservation application functionalities
In this update, the reservation application was extended to include the management of staff assignments, staff, and tables. Added back navigation from management menus to the main menu to provide a more user-friendly interface. Improved the insert functionality for better automation of ID assignment in the database.

Update README and refine SQL scripts
The README file has been updated with instructions for setting up the testing environment. Also, necessary changes were made to the SQL scripts and corresponding Dockerfile changes were applied. This included renaming insertv2.sql to insertFinal.sql and final.sql to createFinal.sql, and improving code readability and management of data insertion.

MESSAGE.value:
Add Docker configuration for RestaurantDB
A Docker deployment configuration has been added for the RestaurantDB. The configuration sets up a MySQL 8.3 image with the necessary environment variables for database connectivity. Port binding is also established to connect on port 3306.

Remove unnecessary SQL scripts
The commit involves the deletion of various SQL scripts that were redundant or obsolete. This clean-up action simplifies the database management and enhances readability of the code base by removing unnecessary SQL scripts used for creating, inserting, selecting and other actions on the database.

Improve test code formatting and nest SQL operations
Test cases in RestaurantTableTest and ReservesRepositoryImplTest are uniformly formatted with the updated indentation. SQL operations in ReservesRepositoryImplTest are now nested inside try-catch blocks, enhancing readability and error handling.

Enhance manager classes, add new manager and fix input issues
Enhancements include updates to existing manager classes for staff, reservations and tables, introducing additional options such as staff and table management functions. A new manager, AssignmentManager, has also been added for better organization. Made corrections to inputs where problematic cases may occur, like entering non-numeric values for numeric entries.

Expand reservation application functionalities
Extended the reservation application to include management of staff assignments, staff, and tables. Additionally, added back navigation from management menus to the main menu, providing a more user-friendly interface. Improved the insert functionality to fully automate ID assignment in the database.

Expand reservation application functionalities
In this update, the reservation application was extended to include the management of staff assignments, staff, and tables. Added back navigation from management menus to the main menu to provide a more user-friendly interface. Improved the insert functionality for better automation of ID assignment in the database.

Update README and refine SQL scripts
The README file has been updated with instructions for setting up the testing environment. Also, necessary changes were made to the SQL scripts and corresponding Dockerfile changes were applied. This included renaming insertv2.sql to insertFinal.sql and final.sql to createFinal.sql, and improving code readability and management of data insertion.
